content.question: Under a fractional reserve banking system, banks are required to

choices.label: keep part of their demand deposits as reserves
expand the money supply when requested by the central bank
insure their deposits against losses and bank runs
pay a fraction of their interest income in taxes
charge the same interest rate on all their loans

content.answer: keep part of their demand deposits as reserves

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply
